channel.title: force, friction on
channel.description: Recent content in force, friction on

item.description: Drag force Drag force is a resistance (opposite force) given by the air (or) water when the object is moving in it Drag force is also called air resistance Related [[Force]] [[Friction]]
Friction Friction is the force between two surfaces which impedes motion and results in heating Friction force act opposite to the motion Friction produces energy loss.
